title: uninstall cannot be used (without --kill) to merely de-init sub-datasets

milestone.title: Release 0.4.2
milestone.description: was never released -- will be absorbed into 0.5

body:
The best achievable result on a freshly installed (without any data or local changes) sub-dataset is a total removal, including from the history of the super-dataset:

```shell

(git)hopa:/tmp/datasets.datalad.org/crcns[master]git
$> datalad uninstall aa-1                                              
[ERROR  ] will not uninstall content in subdatasets without the recursive flag [uninstall.py:__call__:229] (ValueError) 

$> datalad uninstall --recursive aa-1
Nothing was uninstalled

$> datalad uninstall --remove-handles aa-1            
[ERROR  ] will not uninstall content in subdatasets without the recursive flag [uninstall.py:__call__:229] (ValueError) 
(venv-tests) 2 16864 ->1 [1].....................................:Tue 01 Nov 2016 04:37:49 PM EDT:.
(git)hopa:/tmp/datasets.datalad.org/crcns[master]git
$> datalad uninstall --remove-handles --recursive aa-1
[ERROR  ] will not remove the entire dataset (with history) unless forced [uninstall.py:_uninstall:70] (ValueError) 

$> datalad uninstall --remove-handles --recursive --remove-history aa-1
1 item was uninstalled:
Dataset: /tmp/datasets.datalad.org/crcns/aa-1

$> git show
commit 468ab621d78c88d9898ad29d56dad69e7eb52ec1
Author: Yaroslav Halchenko <debian@onerussian.com>
Date:   Tue Nov 1 16:38:22 2016 -0400

    [DATALAD] uninstalled content

diff --git a/.gitmodules b/.gitmodules
index db3486a..e1d3b21 100644
--- a/.gitmodules
+++ b/.gitmodules
@@ -112,9 +112,6 @@
 [submodule "bst-1"]
        path = bst-1
        url = ./bst-1
-[submodule "aa-1"]
-   path = aa-1
-   url = ./aa-1
 [submodule "aa-2"]
        path = aa-2
        url = ./aa-2
@@ -154,5 +151,3 @@
 [submodule "fcx-1"]
        path = fcx-1
        url = ./fcx-1
-
-
diff --git a/aa-1 b/aa-1
deleted file mode 160000
index b923800..0000000
--- a/aa-1
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1 +0,0 @@
-Subproject commit b923800c386837c92bc3d440070ee219606c3ce8
(venv-tests) 2 16867 [1].....................................:Tue 01 Nov 2016 04:38:56 PM EDT:.
(git)hopa:/tmp/datasets.datalad.org/crcns[master]git
$> 
```
